text: فَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرِي وَكُنتُم مِّنۡهُمۡ تَضۡحَكُونَ

translation.en: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them
translation.id: Lalu kamu jadikan mereka buah ejekan, sehingga kamu lupa mengingat Aku, dan kamu (selalu) mentertawakan mereka
